#summary Quick Start will guide you through installing and creating a new project using a solution template from this project.
 * Download and Install the _VS Wizard Extension Installer_ [http://dot-net-solution-templates.googlecode.com/files/TemplateWizardExtensionInstaller.msi Download Here]
 * Download and Install a Solution Template [http://dot-net-solution-templates.googlecode.com/files/LineOfBusinessWebAppTemplate.vsi Download Here]
 * In Visual Studio goto File --> New Project.
 * Select the template under C# --> Line of Business --> Web Application
